business.headline: LIC Smart Pension Plan: Check eligibility and other details The Smart Pension Plan requires a minimum investment of Rs 1,00,000, while there is no cap on the maximum purchase limit.

Tesla set for India entry with first EV shipment in coming months: Report The US carmaker plans to start selling these cars in the three major cities of Mumbai, Delhi, and Bangalore around the third quarter of the year, say reports.

Sensex ends 200 points lower, Nifty below 23,000; HDFC falls over 2%Stock market closing today: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 203.22 points lower at 75,735.96, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 19.75 points to settle at 22,913.15.

Will Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs hurt Indian rupee? It may be noted that India was the 10th biggest exporter to the US in 2024, and higher tariffs might make it tougher for Indian businesses to sell their goods there.

Can employers deny gratuity in any situation? Here's all you need to knowWith the latest ruling, the Supreme Court has stated that if an employer dismisses an employee on grounds of moral turpitude, his gratuity can be forfeited without waiting for a court's verdict.

FIIs continue to dump Indian stocks: Which stocks are feeling the heat? Data from National Securities Depository Limited (NSDL) showed that FPIs have dumped $3.5 billion worth of financial stocks in 2025 so far, accounting for 31% of their total sales of $11.45 billion as of February 14.

RBI may allow some depositors of New India Co-op Bank to withdraw funds: Report Last week, the RBI took strict action against New India Co-operative bank by suspending deposit withdrawals for six months, stopping the issuance of new loans, and appointing an administrator.

Uday Kotak explains how FIIs are gaining at the expense of domestic investorsUday Kotak said that FIIs are benefiting from the investments made by domestic retail investors, who are continuously putting money into the stock market.

Google Pay begins charging for bill payments. Here's what users need to knowThis is not the first time Google Pay has announced the imposition of fees. Last year, it levied Rs 3 convenience fee for mobile recharges.

Indian exporters aren't losing sleep over Donald Trump's tariff threat. Here's whyIndustry executives say US tariff hikes on autos and pharmaceuticals won't hurt Indian exporters much, as competitors from other countries will face the same impact.

Will tax cuts for middle class in budget help boost consumption? RBI says this The RBI bulletin pointed out that the government has given a Rs 1 lakh crore tax break to the middle class, which should leave more money in their pockets.

Dalal Street carnage: Top market investors lose over Rs 80,000 croreThe recent stock market downturn has wiped out over Rs 80,000 crore from the portfolios of some of India's most renowned investors, such as Radhakishan Damani and the Jhunjhunwala family.

EPFO to roll out UPI-based EPF claim withdrawals within 3 months. Check detailsOnce integrated, claim amounts can be easily accessed by the subscribers via digital wallets, mention sources. This would minimise the processing time and lead to an enhanced user-friendly experience.

Is India's economy set for a strong recovery? Here's what RBI saysThe government's push on capital spending, MSMEs, agriculture, and exports is expected to help the economy in the long run while keeping the fiscal deficit in check. A recent repo rate cut might also support domestic demand.

Why shares of cigarette makers ITC, Godfrey Phillips are falling today?ITC's share price was trading 1.44% lower at Rs 400.65 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 11:06 am. Godfrey Phillips shares were down 4.58% to Rs 6,260 and VST Industries stock was down 3% to Rs 290.65.

Why NPS is better than EPF for tax saving under new tax regimeNPS vs EPF: In the case of EPF, employee contributions generally qualify for a deduction under Section 80C of the Income Tax Act, capped at Rs 1.5 lakh annually, under the Old Income Tax regime.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as FMCG, banking stocks drag marketThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 233.22 points to 75,705.96, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 75.05 points to 22,857.85 as of 9:38 AM.

Cigarette prices set to rise? Government may hike GST on tobacco productsCurrently, cigarettes and other tobacco products attract a GST of 28% along with various other levies, taking the total tax burden to 53%.

Dalal Street's losing streak: Why the market fall may not end soonStock Market: The earnings growth of Nifty50 companies was 5% in the October-December quarter, marking the third straight quarter of single-digit growth, which is a sharp contrast to the double-digit profit growth seen in the previous two years.
Sensex, Nifty end marginally lower in volatile session; small and midcaps gainThe S&P BSE Sensex ended 28.21 points lower at 75,939.18, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 12.40 points lower at 22,932.90.

FIIs continue to dump Indian stocks: What it means for your investment portfolioWith FIIs selling aggressively, smallcaps and midcaps bleeding, and China attracting inflows, here's what retail investors should do.

Tesla likely to set up shop in India, may invest $3-5 billion: Sources During their visit, Tesla executives are expected to hold meetings with officials from the Prime Minister's Office (PMO) and other key ministries.
Small SIP, big returns: Check how Rs 250 a month can grow to Rs 17 lakhSBI Mutual Fund's new JanNivesh SIP is making investing more accessible, letting anyone start with as little as Rs 250 a month.

Reliance is India's most valuable company. Check top 10 firms in Hurun India 500The 2024 Burgundy Private Hurun India 500 report values Reliance at Rs 17.5 lakh crore. TCS comes in second at Rs 16.1 lakh crore, and HDFC Bank takes third place with Rs 14.2 lakh crore.

Dr Reddy's, Aurobindo Pharma: Why pharma stocks fell in early trade today?The Nifty Pharma index dropped as much as 2% in early trade. Sun Pharma fell nearly 2%, Dr Reddy's dropped as much as 4%, and Aurobindo Pharma sank almost 6%. Cipla shares also fell.

Tata Motors shares get boost after CLSA upgrade. Check target priceTata Motors share price: At around 11:04 am, shares of Tata Motors were trading 0.34% higher at Rs 683.90 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). It was up over 1% in early trade.

Hexaware Technologies shares debut at 5% premium over IPO priceHexaware Technologies IPO listing: The listing was largely in line with expectations, as the grey market premium (GMP) had disappeared ahead of the debut, indicating weak demand.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as IT, pharma stocks drag marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex shed 291.20 points to 75,676.19, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 88.65 points to 22,856.65 as of 9:25 AM.

Quality Power IPO: Check allotment status, latest GMP and listing date Quality Power IPO allotment status: Investors who applied for the Quality Power IPO can check their allotment status through the BSE website or the registrar's website (Link Intime India Private Ltd).

Elon Musk's Tesla hunts for land in India, Maharashtra leads: ReportWhile Maharashtra is leading the race, other states are also vying for the project. Tesla's plans could change depending on the incentives offered by different states.

Unified Pension Scheme to roll out from April 1. Check eligibility and benefitsUnder the new pension scheme, government employees will contribute 10% of their basic salary along with DA, while the government's contribution will rise from the previous 14% to 18.5%.

ELSS explained: Check tax benefits under Section 80C and other key details ELSS offers market-linked returns and has the potential to generate higher long-term returns as compared to other Section 80C options, including PPF, ULIPS, and NPS, etc.

Trump's reciprocal tariffs could hurt Indian exports. Which sectors are at risk?While officials are still waiting for details on how these tariffs will be calculated, they are already preparing countermeasures and working on a trade deal proposal to reduce tariffs and boost two-way trade.

Sensex, Nifty bounce back from day's low to close flat; IT stocks lead recoveryThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 29.47 points to close at 75,967.39, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 14.20 points to end at 22,945.30.

Want to save taxes? Try these 5 last-minute investment options to maximise benefitsThe Equity-Linked Savings Scheme (ELSS) is a popular tax-saving tool available under Section 80C, offering a lock-in period of three years. Under this, investments up to Rs 1.5 lakh are eligible for deductions.

Sugar gets costlier: Prices rise 6.5% in a month as output dipsSugar price hike: A drop in sugar output, caused by adverse weather and the reopening of sugar exports after two years, has led to a supply shortage, pushing up prices.

New Income Tax Bill: Will taxpayers with late ITR filings lose refunds?Late ITR filing refund concern: The Income Tax Act, 1961, does not prevent taxpayers from claiming a refund just because the return was filed after the deadline.

Licious, backed by Temasek, preps for massive $2 billion IPO: Report Delightful Gourmet Pvt, the parent company of Licious, is expanding its physical store network and improving delivery times to compete with quick-commerce rivals.

Smallcap stocks are bleeding. What should investors do?Smallcap stocks have been battered by the persistent selling by foreign institutional investors (FIIs). A dismal Q3 earnings season has only worsened the situation.

Indian Overseas Bank rolls out Aadhaar-based account opening. Check detailsThis new initiative allows customers to open savings bank accounts online with minimal documentation, as per Reserve Bank of India's eKYC guidelines.

entertainment.headline: The Last Of Us Part 2 release date announced The Last Of Us Part 2's release date has been announced. The Pedro Pascal show is all set to stream on Prime Video from April 13.

Is Eminem finally coming to India? Rapper's leaked schedule hints soLeaked documents have suggested that Eminem will perform in Mumbai in June 2025 as part of his world tour. The rapper's first visit to India is stirring excitement among fans.
Iconic TV show CID now streaming on NetflixCID on Netflix: The iconic Indian crime series CID is now available on Netflix, allowing fans worldwide to stream the popular show.

Will Prime Video's Jack Reacher ever visit India? Author Lee Child speaksAuthor Lee Child, whose Reacher books have inspired a series on Prime Video, spoke to India Today Digital, about the possibility of seeing his leading character travelling to India in the future.

Vlogger Shenaz Treasury reveals losing a brand deal after Ranveer Allahbadia row Former actor and influencer Shenaz Treasury recently shared how she lost a brand deal after Ranveer Allahbadia's controversy.

Nadaaniyan: Ibrahim Ali Khan explains love to Miss Briganza; release date outNetflix on Thursday announced the release date of Ibrahim Ali Khan and Khushi Kapoor's 'Nadaaniyan'. The film is a Gen-Z love story and is set in Delhi-Noida.

Palak Muchhal on timeless appeal of Sanam Teri Kasam title song: It's magicalSanam Teri Kasam's title track is topping the music charts. Singer Palak Muchhal calls it surreal, recalls recording it, and hints at a new version. She also discusses Amitabh Bachchan's praise and the evolving music industry.

They'll just ask Samay Raina to write a 300-word essay: Comic mocks outrageComedian Daniel Fernandes mocked the outrage over Samay Raina's controversy, joking that he'd only need to write a "300-word essay." He also criticised calls to ban India's Got Latent.

Rihanna, A$AP Rocky to name next baby after lawyer who helped win caseIn a statement, A$AP Rocky's lawyer revealed that the rapper and his long-time partner Rihanna jokingly promised to name their next child after him. A$AP Rocky was found not guilty in a felony assault trial.

Aashram 3 part 2 trailer: Bobby Deol is back as the menacing Baba NiralaAshram Season 3, Part 2 trailer: The much-awaited Aashram returns with Part 2 of Season 3, directed by Prakash Jha. The new season delves into themes of power, betrayal, and revenge.

Melo Movie review: A slow-burn, mature drama that will stay with youReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Melo Movie released in Netflix on February 14. Starring Choi Woo-shik and Park Bo-young, the 10-episode-show deals with love, loss, and grief.

New Matthew Perry documentary promises to dig deep into the Hollywood tragedyA new Matthew Perry documentary called Matthew Perry: A Hollywood Tragedy will be out later this month, wherein the makers will investigate the untimely death of the Friends star.

The First Frost review: Love, trauma, longing - new Chinese drama delivers it all Released-Thu Feb 20, 2025The First Frost review: This Chinese drama delves into the complexities of love, trauma, and longing, offering a poignant narrative that diverges from typical romance tropes. With its melancholic visuals and dual perspectives, it explores the tangled history between its protagonists, making it a compelling watch.

Uorfi Javed's mother on her bold fashion: Was shocked at first, but I support herUorfi Javed revealed her mother was the first in their family to try Botox. Her mother also recalled her reaction when she saw Uorfi's "new style".

Suzhal 2 trailer: Kathir takes on gripping murder mystery with Aishwarya RajeshThe official trailer of the highly-anticipated second season of the Tamil crime thriller Suzhal - The Vortex was released on Wednesday. Starring Kathir and Aishwarya Rajesh in lead roles, the series will premiere on Prime Video on February 28.

Rihanna 'thankful, humbled' after A$AP Rocky found not guilty in shooting caseA$AP Rocky was declared not guilty in a felony assault trial, leading to an emotional embrace with Rihanna in court. After the verdict, the singer issued her first statement, expressing relief.

Retro hits to soulful music: Magical evening at Papon's Valentine's Day special showPapon's concert in Delhi, hosted by TV9, was an unforgettable night filled with soulful music. Held at Major Dhyan Chand National Stadium, the event was part of the World Travel and Tourism Festival.

Watch: Arijit Singh attends father's video call during live concertArijit Singh's live concert in Chandigarh was made memorable by a surprise video call from his father during his performance. The singer shared heartfelt moments from the event on Instagram, expressing gratitude to his fans.

Pics: Singer Anuv Jain married, shares photos with wifeSinger Anuv Jain, popular for songs like Baarishein, is now married. He shared photos from the wedding and pre-wedding festivities on social media.

Singer Akhil Sachdeva on Diljit Dosanjh's infrastructure remark: I feel it's amazingSinger Akhil Sachdeva discusses the rise of concerts in India, film vs indie music, ticket prices, and Diljit Dosanjh's comments on concert infrastructure. He also stresses the importance of crediting technicians.

K-slate 2025: When Life Gives You Tangerine to Wife of a 21st Century PrinceKakao Entertainment is set to make 2025 a landmark year for K-dramas and films, with a rich array of releases across various genres. From gripping thrillers to heartwarming romances, the lineup promises stellar performances and captivating stories.

Dabba Cartel trailer: Shabana Azmi, Jyotika promise an addictive showThe trailer for Netflix's Dabba Cartel unveils a gripping crime drama about five women whose dabba business unexpectedly plunges them into the dangerous world of a drug cartel.

Kim Sae-ron's father blames YouTuber for death, co-star Won Bin breaks downSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron's father spoke out at her funeral, held a day after her death, highlighting the emotional distress she suffered due to a YouTuber's videos.

Karan Singh Grover back on TV 5 years after Kasautii Zindagii Kay: ReportActor Karan Singh Grover might just be a part of a romantic show very soon. He is reported to be seen alongside Helly Shah in this new TV show.

Late Linkin Park singer Chester Bennington's child comes out as transgenderLinkin Park singer Chester Bennington's child, Draven, has come out as transgender. The artiste shared the news on her social media handle, while stating her preferred pronouns in a small note.

Amit Trivedi: Global artists performing in India is nothing but pure businessIndia has become a hotspot for global artists to perform, drawing big names like Coldplay, Ed Sheeran, and Dua Lipa. Music composer Amit Trivedi believes their choice is driven by business interests, as they seek lucrative opportunities in the country.

Bridgerton 4 first look: Benedict-Sophie's love story takes centre stageThe fourth season of Bridgerton is set to spotlight Benedict Bridgerton's romance with Sophie Baek. New characters like Katie Leung's Lady Araminta Gun will add intrigue to the season.

Legends of Shiva: Amish Tripathi gets real about Lord Shiva in his latest showAuthor and producer Amish Tripathi returns as host of Legends of Shiva with Amish, a new show on Discovery Channel, exploring Lord Shiva beyond myths. Unveiled at the New Delhi Book Fair, it promises a deep dive into mythology coinciding with Maha Kumbh 2025.

Amortage review: Jisoo's album shakes things up like an 'earthquake'Jisoo's new EP, Amortage, released on February 14, 2025, marks her evolution as a solo artist. The EP blends pop and R&B to explore love's many facets, featuring English tracks and her own songwriting.

Bhabiji writer Manoj Santoshi battles cancer, Shilpa Shinde takes care of himActor Kavita Kaushik made an emotional post on social media, highlighting screenwriter Manoj Santoshi's struggle with liver cancer. She also mentioned actor Shilpa Shinde and thanked her for taking care of him.

The Witch review: Jinyoung, Jeong-eui shine in slow-burning psychological mysteryReleased-Sat Feb 15, 2025The Witch review: The Witch, a new K-drama starring Jinyoung and Jeong-eui, captivates with its psychological mystery and slow-burning narrative. The series, based on a popular webtoon, blends mystery, romance, and suspense, leaving viewers intrigued by the enigmatic characters and their complex interactions, says our review.

Rashami Desai on love-hate bond with Sidharth Shukla: We'd communicate through eyesActor Rashami Desai, who had worked with the late Sidharth Shukla on 'Dil Se Dil Tak' and 'Bigg Boss 13', was reminded of her relationship with him on comedian Bharti Singh's podcast.

Stray Kids' Felix suffers fracture after car accident, misses group's fan meetFelix, a member of the boy band Stray Kids, suffered an arm fracture in a minor car accident, causing him to miss the band's fifth fan meeting.

South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron wanted to make a comeback to films, open a cafeSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, who was found dead in her apartment on Sunday, had wished to make a comeback to the entertainment world, revealed a friend recently.

Gajraj Rao, Renuka Shahane's Dupahiya to bring laughter and chaos to Prime VideoPrime Video's Dupahiya is set in a crime-free village where the first-ever theft of a motorbike creates chaos and drama. Starring Gajraj Rao and Renuka Shahane, the comedy series starts streaming on March 7.

South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, 24, found deadSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, known for her roles in Bloodhounds and The Man from Nowhere, was found dead at her home in Seoul. She was 24. Authorities are investigating the circumstances of her death, with no signs of foul play reported yet.

The White Lotus S3 review: Predictable? Yes. Addictive? Also, yesReleased-Mon Feb 17, 2025The White Lotus Season 3 review: The White Lotus returns with a new season set in Thailand, offering a fresh cultural backdrop while retaining its biting satire on the ultra-rich. The series continues to entertain with its dark humour and ensemble cast, though its formula is starting to feel familiar. Read our full review.

Kanye West says he fought 5 hours for Grammy tickets amid guest list confusionRapper Kanye West, in a post on X, revealed that he fought for five hours to secure Grammy tickets amid guest list chaos. This comes amid claims that Kanye arrived at the event uninvited.

Comedian Anubhav Bassi's Lucknow show cancelled after warning over foul languageThe shows of comedian Anubhav Singh Bassi in Lucknow were cancelled due to concerns over inappropriate content, following a complaint by the UP Women's Commission vice-chairperson. Authorities cited potential law and order issues as reasons for the cancellation.

Watch: Chum Darang blushes as Karan Veer confesses love on Valentine's DayKaran Veer Mehra confessed his love for Chum Darang on Valentine's Day. Chum shared a post from their romantic outing on social media.

general news.headline: Surrender looted weapons: Manipur Governor's 7-day ultimatum amid unrestAmid the ongoing President's Rule in Manipur, Governor Ajay Bhalla has asked all communities to surrender looted and illegal weapons within seven days, assuring no punitive action.

Rekha Gupta takes oath as Delhi's 4th woman Chief Minister amid NDA unity showDelhi New CM: Rekha Gupta took oath as the fourth woman Chief Minister of Delhi in the presence of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and NDA Chief Ministers in a mega show of unity.

Tool for foreign agencies: BJP jabs Rahul Gandhi after Trump's poll meddling claimBJP leader Amit Malviya said that Trump's statement "confirmed" that there was an attempt to influence election in India and to install someone other than PM Modi.

IND vs BAN Live: Shami takes 5 wickets after Towhid Hridoy hits hundredIndia vs Bangladesh Live Score, Champions Trophy updates: Towhid Hridoy has taken Bangladesh closer to the 250-run mark. After the Tigers lost five wickets for 35 runs, Hridoy and Jaker Ali Anik have put their team in a decent position. Mohammed Shami has taken four wickets.

Maha Kumbh to end with all seven planets visible from IndiaThis celestial alignment adds a unique layer of significance to Maha Kumbh, as many believe that such cosmic events amplify spiritual energies.

USAID for voter turnout: Can Rs 182 crore turn an Indian election?US President Donald Trump suggested that USAID, an independent US aid agency that handles $42 billion of funds, interfered in India's electoral process. The USAID dedicated Rs 182 crore to boost voter turnout in India when the country spends Rs 16 lakh crore in general elections. Can this drop in the ocean influence poll outcomes?

Trump's trade tirade over Musk's plan to launch Tesla in India: Unfair to USDonald Trump reiterated his stance on trade imbalances and tariffs, stating that it would be "unfair" to the US if Tesla were to set up operations in India.

Adhere to ethics code: Centre to OTT platforms amid vulgar joke rowThe Centre's move came after the top court on Tuesday stressed that "there was a need to do something", and that YouTubers were misusing the lack of regulation on online platforms.

Archaeologists dive into sea for 4,000-year-old Dwarka, Krishna's karmabhoomiThe ASI's Underwater Archaeology Wing has launched a fresh exploration exercise off the coast of Gujarat at Dwarka, believed to be Lord Krishna's legendary city. The renewed attempt, after two decades, is to study and preserve cultural heritage in the depths of the Arabian Sea.

LPU's 2025 Batch Final Year Student Bags Rs 1.03 Crore ($1,18,000) Placement Package-Betireddy Naga Vamsi Reddy B. Tech student has secured a 1.03 Crore ($1,18,000) package with an AI robotics company and is set to graduate in May 2025. 

-Over 1,700 students have received packages ranging from Rs 10 LPA – Rs 1 Crore per annum 

-1,912 students received multiple job offers while Adireddy Vasu, secured 7 job offers, setting a rare and impressive record.

Trump drops bombshell, suggests US deep state was trying to elect someone elseDonald Trump's latest remarks come as he continues to defend the Elon Musk-led Department of Government Efficiency's move to cut the $21 million funding for India, while questioning why the country needs it despite its strong economic position.

Ancient secret: Radioactive anomaly detected under Pacific OceanBeryllium-10 is a rare radioactive isotope produced by cosmic rays in the atmosphere that can provide valuable insights into the Earth's geological history.

'Help us' signs on windows of Panama hotel holding Indian deportees from USAccording to an Associated Press report, a majority of the nearly 300 deportees belonged to India, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Afghanistan and China. Panama is being used as a stop-over as the US faces difficulties in the deportation process to some of these nations.

Swati Maliwal seen at Delhi Chief Minister's oath-takingAAP has been accusing Swati Maliwal of being a BJP agent amid her ongoing rift with the party leadership since May last year when she accused Bibhav Kumar, a close aide of Kejriwal, of physically assaulting her at Arvind Kejriwal's residence.

Is ODI cricket dying? Fans question empty stands in India vs Bangladesh gameThe empty stands at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium during the India vs Bangladesh match of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 went viral all over social media as fans began questioning the relevance of ODI cricket.

What got Manjinder Singh Sirsa into Delhi's magnificent sevenThe BJP's decision to induct Manjinder Singh Sirsa into the Delhi Cabinet of Chief Minister Rekha Gupta isn't just about representation. It's a calculated move with an eye on Punjab. By elevating Sirsa, a Sikh leader, the BJP is seemingly aiming to consolidate support in Delhi while setting the stage for a larger battle against AAP in Punjab.

IndiGo staff, passenger argue over damaged luggage. Airline reacts to viral videoAn IndiGo passenger shared a clip that showed a staff member telling him, "You can't take my video," as he attempted to record the incident.

Rohit Sharma drops catch to deny Axar hat-trick, slams ground in frustrationIndia vs Bangladesh: India captain Rohit Sharma dropped the simplest of catches in the slip on Thursday, February 20. Rohit's drop in 1st slip denied Axar Patel of what could have been his maiden hat trick.

No scope: Omar Abdullah's U-turn on dialogue with Pakistan over KashmirOmar Abdullah, who had last year pitched for talks between the two nations, accused Pakistan of 'meddling' in the affairs of Jammu and Kashmir.

Hamas releases bodies of youngest Israeli hostages, their mother under truce dealShiri, Ariel and Kfir Bibas were aged 32, four and nine months when they were abducted as Hamas launched its unprecedented attack on Israel on October 7, 2023. Without any evidence, Hamas said the next month that the three were killed in an Israeli airstrike.

Chhattisgarh man's job application to Swiggy Instamart on LinkedIn wins InternetIn his LinkedIn post, Pranay Awadhiya shared six slides of his creative job application and captioned it: "Hello Swiggy Instamart, I saw that you are hiring a copywriter! So, here is something for you."

Favouritism at its peak: Fans fume as India drop Arshdeep, pick Harshit RanaIndia vs Bangladesh, Champions Trophy 2025: India dropped Arshdeep Singh and picked Harshit Rana in their XI for their first match in Dubai on Thursday. Mohammed Shami returned to the XI along with Ravindra Jadeja.

BJP's Vijender Gupta, once thrown out of Delhi Assembly, comes back as SpeakerVijender Gupta, who won in 2015 and 2020 amid the Kejriwal wave, will chair the proceedings of the Delhi Assembly from where he was once dragged out.

Yuzvendra Chahal shares another cryptic post, thanks God amid divorce rumoursIndia cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal shared yet another cryptic post on Instagram amid divorce rumours with partner Dhanashree Verma. Chahal took to Instagram to thank God for protecting him from evil.

Pushpa actor Dhananjaya's wedding pics out, Rashmika Mandanna reactsKannada actor Daali Dhananjaya recently got married to his long-time girlfriend Dr Dhanyatha Gauraklar. Here's how his Pushpa co-star Rashmika Mandanna reacted to their first picture together after the wedding.

Chiranjeevi, wife Surekha celebrate 46th wedding anniversary mid-air with friendsChiranjeevi and his wife Surekha marked their 46th wedding anniversary in a unique way by celebrating mid-air while travelling to Dubai. The celebration was made more special with friends like Nagarjuna and Namrata Shirodkar joining in.

Composer Thaman S says no one should marry as 'girls want to be independent'Music composer Thaman S appeared on a podcast and discussed his views on marriage. The 'Daaku Maharaaj' composer, who's been married for over 30 years, blamed independent women for changing society.
Jr NTR, Prashanth Neel begin 'deadliest showdown' for NTR 31, see pic from setsJr NTR has begun shooting for his next film with director Prashanth Neel. The film is tentatively titled Dragon.

sports.headline: Badminton star Satwiksairaj Rankireddy's father, 65, dies due to cardiac arrestIndia badminton star Satwiksairaj Rankireddy's father R Kasi Viswanatham died due to cardiac arrest. Satwik's father was set to meet his son in New Delhi.

Mohammed Shami sets world record, faster than Mitchell Starc to 200 ODI wickets Champions Trophy 2025: Mohammed Shami picked up his 200th wicket in India's Group A match against Bangladesh in Dubai. The senior pacer returned to fine form, leading India's bowling attack in the marquee tournament.

Champions Trophy: Shoaib Akhtar fumes at Pakistan for timid batting vs New Zealand Former Pakistan fast bowler Shoaib Akhtar has slammed the national side for their timid batting approach in their opening match of the ICC Champions Trophy vs New Zealand.

Watch: Wasim Akram's hilarious take on Babar Azam's slow knock vs New ZealandChampions Trophy 2025: Wasim Akram came up with a hilarious analogy to describe Babar Azam's 90-ball 64, which cost Pakistan their opening match against New Zealand in Karachi.

Babar Azam's poor intent at start cost Pakistan vs New Zealand: Sanjay BangarFormer India cricketer and batting coach Sanjay Bangar said that Babar Azam's poor intent with the bat cost Pakistan dearly in their opening match of the Champions Trophy vs New Zealand.

Favouritism at its peak: Fans fume as India drop Arshdeep, pick Harshit RanaIndia vs Bangladesh, Champions Trophy 2025: India dropped Arshdeep Singh and picked Harshit Rana in their XI for their first match in Dubai on Thursday. Mohammed Shami returned to the XI along with Ravindra Jadeja.

WTA bans 'fixated' fan after Emma Raducanu incident in Dubai incidentThe WTA has banned a man for "fixated behavior" toward Emma Raducanu after security removed him during her Dubai Championship match, leaving the former U.S. Open champion visibly shaken but determined to compete.

Rohit Sharma drops catch to deny Axar hat-trick, slams ground in frustrationIndia vs Bangladesh: India captain Rohit Sharma dropped the simplest of catches in the slip on Thursday, February 20. Rohit's drop in 1st slip denied Axar Patel of what could have been his maiden hat trick.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
